Package com.enttribe.hrms.integration.service

Interface DocumentIntegrationService

All Known Implementing Classes:
DocumentIntegrationServiceImpl
public interface DocumentIntegrationService
The DocumentIntegrationService interface represents a service for managing documents and attachments. This interface defines methods to upload, delete, download, and retrieve documents and their metadata.

  • Method Details

    • uploadDocument

      com.enttribe.document.model.Document uploadDocument(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file, String fileName, String referenceId, String applicatoinName, String entityName)
      Uploads a document file and associates it with a reference entity.
      Parameters:
      file - The MultipartFile representing the document file to be uploaded.
      fileName - The name of the document file.
      referenceId - The reference ID of the entity to which the document is associated.
      applicatoinName - The name of the application to which the entity belongs.
      entityName - The name of the entity to which the document is related.
      Returns:
      The Document object representing the uploaded document and its metadata.

    • deleteFileEntityAttachment

      String deleteFileEntityAttachment(Integer documentIdPk)
      Deletes a document entity attachment based on its document ID.
      Parameters:
      documentIdPk - The primary key (ID) of the document to be deleted.
      Returns:
      A String message indicating the success or failure of the deletion process.

    • downloadAttachment

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<com.enttribe.document.model.Document> downloadAttachment(Integer documentIdPk)
      Downloads the attachment associated with a document entity based on its document ID.
      Parameters:
      documentIdPk - The primary key (ID) of the document to be downloaded.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity representing the file attachment to be downloaded.

    • countOfMyDocuments

      Integer countOfMyDocuments(Integer parentId, String searchText)
      Retrieves the count of documents associated with a specific parent entity.
      Parameters:
      parentId - The ID of the parent entity to which the documents are associated.
      searchText - The search text used to filter documents by name or content.
      Returns:
      The total count of documents matching the search criteria.

    • getMyDocuments

      List<com.enttribe.document.model.Document> getMyDocuments(Integer parentId, Integer upperLimit, Integer lowerLimit, String modifiedTimeType, Long modificationtime, String searchText)
      Retrieves a list of documents associated with a specific parent entity.
      Parameters:
      parentId - The ID of the parent entity to which the documents are associated.
      upperLimit - The upper limit of the result set for pagination.
      lowerLimit - The lower limit of the result set for pagination.
      modifiedTimeType - The type of modification time used for filtering (e.g., "before" or "after").
      modificationtime - The modification time value used for filtering documents by their modified time.
      searchText - The search text used to filter documents by name or content.
      Returns:
      A list of Document objects representing the matching documents.

    • getSubFolderByReferenceValueAndType

      com.enttribe.document.model.SubFolder getSubFolderByReferenceValueAndType(String referenceType, String referenceValue)
      Retrieves a SubFolder based on the provided reference type and value.
      Parameters:
      referenceType - The type of reference (e.g., "folder" or "document") used for filtering.
      referenceValue - The reference value (e.g., folder name or document ID) used for filtering.
      Returns:
      The SubFolder object representing the matching subfolder, or null if not found.
